name: Sawmill Farm Pancakes
keywords: egg, flour, milk, main course, nut-free

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, sugar, milk and eggs.

Grease a griddle or frying pan lightly and heat over medium heat. Pour enough of the batter out to make a thin, 7-inch pancake. It will begin to bubble almost immediately. Cook 1 to 2 minutes, flip over and cook another 1 1/2 minutes. Remove to a heated platter and repeat with remaining batter.
Brush the pancakes with melted butter and sprinkle with confectioners' sugar. Serve with maple syrup.
